content.text:
[@Iikku](@3zpkedkEUhunChaYyg2yTtZTr9ubs9O4TK9MO/DGUGo=.ed25519) 

From the `scat` directory:

```
npx sbot server
```

In another terminal, from the same directory:

```
npx sbot publish --type about --about '@3zpkedkEUhunChaYyg2yTtZTr9ubs9O4TK9MO/DGUGo=.ed25519' --name 'Iikku MK II'
```

If you have a jq installed, you could replace the above with:

```
npx sbot publish --type about --about $(sbot whoami | jq -r .id) --name 'Iikku MK II'
```
